about_the_game:
After a night filled with nightmares, you find yourself in an unfamiliar mansion. All you know is that you must escape... But this place is no ordinary building; it’s a labyrinth filled with dark forces that are constantly trying to catch you. In every corner, in every room, dark memories from your past come to life, and every death pulls you back into the same nightmare.

The only way out of these dark rooms is to unravel the mystery of the ghost that haunts you and avoid the deadly traps. But remember, every mistake will send you back to the beginning, and each attempt at escape will become even more difficult. Deep within the mansion, you must use all your courage and wits to uncover the truth and break the endless cycle.

This game offers a dark psychological survival horror experience, where you will walk the fine line between reality and dream, plunging into the depths of fear with an atmosphere that keeps you on edge at every moment. Masterfully created with the latest technology, be ready to confront your fears in this immersive world.

The Critical Importance of Traps

In this mansion, every step you take can turn into a trap. Filled with hidden mechanisms, invisible wires, and unexpected dangers, this labyrinth is designed to send you back to the beginning with even the slightest mistake. Each trap is meticulously crafted to stop you and diminish your chances of escaping this horrific cycle. Therefore, you must think twice before taking each step and carefully inspect every corner; survival depends on your ability to outsmart these deadly traps.



The Sense of Discovery

As you progress through this dark mansion, each new room and corridor holds the thrill of uncovering the unknown. Every corner, every door could lead you to a vital clue or a dangerous trap. This journey of discovery is both intriguing and unsettling, allowing you to deeply feel the tension between fear and curiosity with each step. Gather your courage and keep exploring this place filled with dark secrets, as there are mysteries waiting to be unveiled.



Dark Atmosphere and Tension

This mansion is enveloped in a suffocating dark atmosphere. With almost no light, the feeling that something is lurking in the shadows constantly builds up. The sounds and moving shadows heighten the tension, making your heart race. In such an environment, predicting what awaits you becomes challenging, and every step is accompanied by an increasing sense of dread. To survive in this terrifying place, sharp senses and calmness are essential.

content_descriptors.notes: Disturbing sounds, horror elements, and tension in the dark atmosphere

name: Cursed Loop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Trapped in a nightmare, every death pulls you back into the same dark cycle. Test your spirit and courage as you escape the depths of a sinister mansion.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
